topic.title: Extracting Text from Document Using XPath

body.p:
You can use the oxy_xpath CSS extension function to execute an XPath expression over the input document. The main advantage is that you can execute any XPath processing, including:
Document data retrieval
Mathematical calculus
If then else conditions You can use oxy_xpath in values of all properties defined in a page rule.
body.note: This technique is not standard and is guaranteed to work only with this processor.

The XPath expression from the page rules is evaluated in the context of the document root element, so you will need to use absolute expressions starting with / or //. This is different from the case when the oxy_xpath is used in CSS rules that match an element. In this case, the XPath expressions are evaluated in the context of the matched element and you can use relative paths.
